channel.title: 'Postgres | Supabase Blog
channel.description: Latest Postgres news from Pavel Borisov at Supabase

item.title: pgvector 0.4.0 performance
item.description: There's been lot of talk about pgvector performance lately, so we took some datasets and pushed pgvector to the limits to find out its strengths and limitations.

item.title: What's new in Postgres 15?
item.description: Describes the release of Postgres 15, new features and reasons to use it

item.title: What is PostgreSQL commitfest and how to contribute
item.description: A time-tested method for contributing to the core Postgres code
